Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>But why am I talking about that? There's
more pressing news to discuss!
Talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Purah is in that <clr:0000>building with
the telescope<clr:ffff>.
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_00>Hello again, Mr. Link! Were you up all
night? You must be tired!
BlackZelda_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Did you hear, Mr. Link?!<sp:5:0:0>


Someone that looked like Princess Zelda
was seen at Hyrule Castle!

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_01>At least, that's what I heard. Pretty
important news, if it's true!
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_00>Hello again, Mr. Link! We've been seeing
lots of monsters appear at night. I hope
you've stayed safe out there.
BlackZelda_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Admiration_01>It's a long way between here and
<clr:0000>Hyrule Castle<clr:ffff>, but I'm determined to see
if I can spot <clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff> from here.<sp:0:4:0>Who needs a <clr:0000>telescope<clr:ffff>? If I put enough
heart into it, my eyes will do what they've
got to!
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_00>Hello again, Mr. Link! Been working
hard today, huh?
BlackZelda_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Admiration_01>I don't need a telescope to help save
<clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff>. My heart's in it, and so
my eyes will be too.
I won't give up until she's safe!
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_00>Hello again, Mr. Link! There are lots of
monsters outside this late. That's got to
make things tough for travelers.
Talk_11: <sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>Link? Mr. Link?<sp:0:4:0>Is that really you?!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Where have you been?!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_00>Hello again, Mr. Link! You must be soaked
through! Stay dry if you can!
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_01>No one's seen you or <clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff>
since you went under the castle to
investigate the gloom!
And that's when the castle rose into
the air! Everyone's been so worried
about both of you.<sp:0:4:0><clr:0000>Purah<clr:ffff> has barely slept. She's been trying
to figure out where you two went!
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Understand_00>At the moment, Purah should be in that
<clr:0000>building with the telescope<clr:ffff>.
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Admiration_01>Look at this! I made it for fighting off
monsters. Pretty nifty, huh?<sp:0:4:0>Our iron weapons <clr:0000>decayed<clr:ffff>, and there's a
lack of equipment around here. So I stuck
a <clr:0000>rock<clr:ffff> to the end of a <clr:0000>long stick<clr:ffff>!
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>Looks odd, but it'll work.
Talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Please, hurry there now. She'll want to
know that you're all right.
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Admiration_01>I had to make my own weapon. Just a
<clr:0000>rock<clr:ffff> stuck on a <clr:0000>stick<clr:ffff>. Pretty nifty, if you
ask me.
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>Huh? Mr. <sp:5:1:0>Link?<sp:0:4:0><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>No way! It can't be!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0><clr:ffff><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Please, check in with <clr:0000>Purah<clr:ffff>! She
keeps an eye on everything here at
<clr:0000>Lookout Landing<clr:ffff>!
Talk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I've never met any Gerudo before.
Those spears of theirs are beautifully
made, aren't they?
<snd:Understand_01>It's not often enough that I get to see
weapons from other parts of Hyrule...<sp:0:4:0>I've got to sear the sight of them into
my memory!
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal_01>That is really you...<sp:5:1:0>right, Mr. Link?<sp:0:4:0><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>I just can't believe it!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01><clr:ffff>Please, be sure to check in with <clr:0000>Purah<clr:ffff>.
She keeps an eye on everything here at
<clr:0000>Lookout Landing<clr:ffff>.
Talk_29:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Understand>It's not often enough that I get to see
weapons from other parts of Hyrule.
Those Gerudo spears are just beautiful!
I've got to sear the sight of them into
my memory!
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>Mr. Link, did you hear? Gerudo soldiers
came to aid us!<sp:0:4:0>We've been barely scraping by with our
handmade weapons. Now it'll be much
easier to protect Lookout Landing!
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:QuestionSurprise_00>Eee!<sp:5:1:0> I don't believe it! The legendary
Mr. Link is talking to me!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>You wanted a closer look at this weapon,
I take it?
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>With this weapon in my hand and the
Gerudo by my side, I'm not a bit scared
of those monsters!
